name: Flypy Bird
description:
The mobile game is similar to Flappy bird, a simple game developed with Unity for my study material. I was still in high school, assigned to develop games, and then published. sorry to copy a bit (i guess...) and then publish, at least it's free!

How to play?
Just like Flappy Bird, click once and the bird will fly up in just a few seconds

Welp, this game is newly made for android

C'mon this is just the beginning, I'm working on a new project...
Donate me to if you want to support me in making games, it will help me a lot :)

And it looks like this game will not be continued..
